title: This new Nintendo Switch game wants to get you fit and healthy: we tried it out
text:
As an avid gamer, I’m constantly being told my hobby is a ‘waste of time’ or ‘mindless entertainment'. While I tend to disagree with these points, I would at least concede that gaming is probably not the healthiest of hobbies.

eSports is no substitution for actual sports when it comes to improving fitness and losing weight. Sitting on the couch all day battling monsters is never going to be as healthy as taking a walk or going to the gym.

However, in defence of video-games, they are generally built for the express purpose of being fun, which is more than I can say for my local gym or running around in the rain playing football.
